translations.subject: Subject
translations.sentMessage: Your message has been sent. Thank you!
translations.titleWhatIs: What is an Early Adopter View?
translations.descWhatIs: It is a preliminary version of a product or feature designed for users who want to try new functionalities before their official release. These users are key to providing feedback and helping us improve.
translations.featuresAccess: Limited access to a select group of users.
translations.featuresFeedback: Active feedback to improve the product.
translations.descHelp: As an Early Adopter, you will have the opportunity to test our developing features and provide your valuable feedback. Your participation is essential to help us build a better product.
translations.buttonJoin: I want to be an Early Adopter!
